object.name: proposal_drop_box
object.property: A new one of these should be created for each type of proposal or proposal cycle. This is where the proposers put their proposals. It is recommended that these be created in the root of the site. After things are complete the whole container can be moved.

<model xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema">
    <schema>
      <field name="instructions" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText">
        <default><p><b>SUBMISSION WINDOW CLOSES <span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0); ">&lt;INSERT DATE and TIME&gt;</span></b></p>
  <p><strong>Creating a New Proposal</strong></p>
  <ol>
  <li>Make sure you want to create a <span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0); ">&lt;INSERT PROPOSAL TYPE&gt;</span>.  If not look at the links near the top of the site to find the appropriate place to submit the type of proposal you wish.  If you do not see the appropriate type, you are not visiting the proper web site.</li>
  <li>From the "Add New..." menu above select the type of proposal you wish to prepare.  More detailed instructions available <span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0); ">&lt;INSERT LINK&gt;</span>.</li>
  </ol>
  <p><strong>Editing or Viewing an Existing Proposal</strong></p>
  <ol>
  <li>Proposals that are being reviewed will be invisible to their creators in order to maintain confidentiality of the process.</li>
  <li>Click on the link to the existing proposal below to access it.</li>
  </ol>
  <p><strong>Reviewing a Proposal</strong></p>
  <ol>
  <li>Links to proposals you are assigned to review are below.</li>
  <li>Click on each link to access the proposals.  Detailed instructions for reviewers are <span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0); ">&lt;INSERT LINK&gt;</span>.</li>
  </ol></default>
        <description>Edit to be appropriate for your situation.</description>
        <title>Instructions</title>
      </field>
    </schema>
  </model>
